TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SyncFromAllServersErrorInformation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Gets the category of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"> exception.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersErrorCategory"> enumeration value that indicates the category of the error.

Docs.summary: Gets the error code for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"> exception.
Docs.value: A value that identifies the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"> exception error.

Docs.summary: Gets the message that describes the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"> exception.
Docs.value: A message that describes the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"> exception.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the source server for which the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"> exception occurred.
Docs.value: The name of the source server that is involved in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"> exception.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the target server for which the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"> exception occurred.
Docs.value: The name of the target server that is involved in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOperationException"> exception.
